DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Entity will first move to the specified point. Once it reaches the point, it will then move to a series of randomly chosen locations for the specified amount of time. Wandering can be constrained to a specified area.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>initialDestination</myVariableName> <myType>location</myType> <myLabel>Initial Destination</myLabel> <myToolTip>The initial destination that the entity should reach before wandering.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>isIndefinite</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Duration</myLabel> <myToolTip>Choose whether the entity will wander indefinitely or for a fixed amount of time.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Indefinitely</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Indefinitely;Timed</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>wanderTime</myVariableName> <myType>time</myType> <myLabel>Wander Time</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>movementMode</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Movement</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Free</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Free;Restricted to Area</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>area</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Wander Area (Optional)</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAreasFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>destinationRestriction</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Destination Restriction</myLabel> <myToolTip>Wander will choose destinations fitting this restriction</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Anywhere</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Anywhere;On Roads;Off Roads;On Pedestrian Paths</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
